images.copyright: Lightning and storm clouds at sunset near Bowman, Nebraska (© john finney photography/Getty Images)
images.title: You can't silence thunder
images.caption: World Meteorological Day
images.desc: Today, we celebrate World Meteorological Day, commemorating the founding of the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) in 1950. For the annual event, the WMO places emphasis on a different pressing topic each year. The slogan of 2025, 'Closing the early warning gap together,' highlights the importance of timely weather alerts and early action.
